The claim originated from a post on Parl: a social media platform, which stated that President Trump is "strongly considering" pardoning the Capitol rioters.
The post claimed to be from the: WH Office of Pardon Attorney" and was signed by Acting Pardon Attorney Rosalind Sargent-Burns.
The Justice Department issued a statemen: emphasizing that the Office of the Pardon Attorney is not on social media and is not involved in any efforts to pardon individuals or groups involved in the Capitol riot.
